title: Can I write the JEE Mains and Advanced for a second time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can. Jee Mains gives you three attempts and Jee Advance gives you two attempts but the attempts have to be consecutive. So if you are not satisfied with you performance this year, you can take a drop and prepare again for the paper. Hope that answers your question. BEST OF LUCK

As I have answered previously,but still….. You can give Jee Mains thrice 12th year.12+1st year.12+2nd yearYou can give Jee Advanced as per 12th year.12+1st year.Please do note that if you don't qualify for Advanced,even then the attempt is counted. Also,above information is as per General category. Cheers
Yes if it is consecutive for more information check the official site.
